name: idlcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)

stmt.origin: sselda(c2, c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))))
stmt.pretty: sselda(c2, c1, c3, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wss(c1, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→ c1 ⊆ c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wss(c1, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→ c1 ⊆ c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wss(c1, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
-| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→ c1 ⊆ c3)
⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
⊣ c3 = ran(c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
-| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))∧ c2 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ c3)
⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
⊣ c3 = ran(c4)

comment: An element of an ideal is an element of the ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
